page.title: 10Colmonell Fair
page.content: In August,in the manse grounds,there is a fair in aid of church funds.At the fair you can buy second hand toys and things like that.If you pay 25p for children and 50p for adults you get something to eat and drink.If you are a person who likes old churches you can go round the church and go and see the covenanters grave.If you go down past the church hall and on down to the manse there are lots of enjoyable games.At the fishing game you get a fishing rod with string attached toit,and a magnet attached to the string.There are nails and money in envelopes which you have to try to catch.There is a darts game where there is a pound and a five pound note on the board if you get all your darts in the note you get it.There are lots of other good games at the fair.It is good fun and helps the church as well.
